review: Love the stick & the regular Amazon fire TV.  Got the stick for my bedroom since it's such a great price.  The only difference in it from the regular fire TV is it doesn't have the voice requesting, you have to type it in.  Other than that, it's exactly the same!!  So if you don't care about "talking" to it, get this one, it's the much better bargain!!
author: Annette Story "Annetteref"

review: Bought this for my brother and sister in law. Great little chromecast substitution. The only reason for 4 stars is it doesn't support more of the Google apps. Not a big deal if your not invested into the ecosystem. Great little streaming device.
author: William Peterson

review: Great video quality and streaming.  So very simple to set up and use.
author: Valarie Delana

review: Love it. Does everything it promised.
author: Janet D. Crowe

review: Love this product, it was so easy to install, and very easy to use...very pkeased with this purchase....
author: Ella Brandenburg

review: Very easy to setup and once connected to the network, great cartoon character to walk you the the controls on the remote. Vey happy with anything Amazon brings out. High recommend the Fire-Stick. Darrell DeHart
author: Darrell DeHart
